officialTitle: Development and Implementation of a Structured Educational Programme to Increase Patients Knowledge About Fatigue and to Evaluate the Effect of Increased Knowledge on Cancer Patients Experience of Fatigue
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with breast cancer stage I or II.
* Fatigue score more than 2.5 on a NRS (O-10).
* Give written consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Under the age of 10 years,
* Not able to read, write or understand Norwegian.
